::Child smiles a little bit , he had the proof he needed:::

Child: "Vulois if I wanted to rule the universe would the Matrix have blessed 
me with these powers? would the matrix have chosen my father as the heralded 
of peace? would i be in existence if the Matrix did not have a propose for 
me? i ask you this but I see that you do not have the answers so i will show 
my loyalty to you, to my father, to the matrix, and to peace take my spark , 
for it is the only way that you will trust me in full!!!!!!!!!!!!"
 
:::Child opened his chest plate and his spark floated out and towards Vulois. 
Silent tears streaming down Child's face:::
